name: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum - Art Exhibition
name_original: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum - Art Exhibition
description: Use the Art Exhibition application to go behind the scenes for the creation of The Lord of the Rings: Gollum™. Browse through over 100 original sketches and illustrations showing the different steps in the game creation process, and learn more about the characters, environments and story of Gollum. An immersive experience that is a must for fans of Tolkien and video games.
